entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:55 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -39.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 2:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -39.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -43.8°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
